    "message": "Dear AI101 students,\n\nThis is to announce that the final exam for Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence will be held on:\n\nğŸ“… Date: January 18, 2025\nâ° Time: 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM\nâ±ï¸ Duration: 120 minutes\nğŸ“ Location: Building A Room 201\n\nPlease arrive 15 minutes before the exam time. Bring your student ID and necessary writing materials.\n\nGood luck!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "can_group": false,
    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear AI101-3 students,\n\nğŸš€ Group Project has been announced!\n\nğŸ‘¥ Team Size: 3-4 students\nğŸ“… Project Due: December 15, 2024\nğŸ“Š Weight: 25% of final grade\n\nğŸ¯ Project Options:\n1. Web application development\n2. Data analysis and visualization\n3. Machine learning implementation\n4. Mobile app development\n\nğŸ“‹ Deliverables:\n- Source code with documentation\n- Technical report (10-15 pages)\n- 15-minute presentation\n- Demo video (5 minutes)\n\nğŸ“… Important Dates:\n- Team formation: November 20, 2024\n- Project proposal: November 25, 2024\n- Progress report: December 5, 2024\n- Final submission: December 15, 2024\n- Presentations: December 16-18, 2024\n\nStart forming your teams!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "can_group": false,
    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear AI101-3 students,\n\nğŸ“… Midterm Exam Schedule:\n\nğŸ“… Date: November 12, 2024\nâ° Time: Regular class time\nâ±ï¸ Duration: 75 minutes\nğŸ“ Location: Regular classroom\n\nğŸ“š Exam Coverage:\n- Chapters 1-6 from textbook\n- All lecture materials through Week 8\n- Homework assignments 1-4\n\nğŸ“ Format:\n- Multiple choice (40%)\n- Short answer questions (35%)\n- Problem solving (25%)\n\nğŸ’¡ Study Tips:\n- Review lecture slides and notes\n- Practice problems from homework\n- Attend review session on November 10\n\nGood luck with your preparation!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "locked_for_user": false,
    "message": "Dear AI101-3 students,\n\nğŸ“ Assignment 1 has been released and is now available under the Assignments tab.\n\nğŸ“… Due Date: October 15, 2024, 11:59 PM\nğŸ“Š Weight: 15% of final grade\nâ±ï¸ Estimated Time: 8-10 hours\n\nğŸ“‹ Assignment Details:\n- Programming assignment focusing on fundamental concepts\n- Submit your code files (.py, .java, or .cpp)\n- Include a README file with instructions\n- Follow the coding style guidelines\n\nğŸ’» Submission:\n- Upload files to Canvas before the deadline\n- Late submissions: -10% per day\n\nGood luck!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
    "subscription_hold": "topic_is_announcement"
  },

    "message": "Dear AI101-3 students,\n\nWelcome to Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence-3! I'm excited to have you in this course.\n\nğŸ« Course Information:\nğŸ“ Credits: 3\nğŸ“ Exam Type: Closed Book\n\nğŸ“š Course Materials:\n- Please check the syllabus for required textbooks\n- All lecture slides will be posted on Canvas\n- Office hours: Tuesdays and Thursdays 2:00-4:00 PM\n\nğŸ’¡ Important Notes:\n- Please introduce yourself in the discussion forum\n- Check your email regularly for course updates\n- Don't hesitate to ask questions!\n\nLooking forward to a great semester!\n\nBest regards,\nCourse Instructor",
